name: I Wanna Go On A Magical Adventure (Game Jam Demo)
name_original: I Wanna Go On A Magical Adventure (Game Jam Demo)
description:
I made this game in 5 (kinda 6) days for the first I Wanna Game Jam, The theme was magic, And I decided to go with an idea I've had in my head for several years, even before entering the community. Of course, I had to simplify it a bit, but the base concept is still here. I hope you enjoy the game as much as I did when making it.

-------------------------------

Notice for rebind players:

The following controls will need to be rebound, as well as normal fangame controls:

A/S: Swap Bullet Type

Down: Crouch

Up: Open Doors, Read Signs

-------------------------------

Music: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLz_LBbuAykAxYRmVaVb20u0z_SEhnNRyZ
